changelog:
• Live Preview and EPG now available in Live TV section
• Single Tap for Live Preview, Double Tap to open Main Player
• TV Channels can now change using Remote UP/DOWN buttons
• Background Radio mode for TV channels
• Inbuilt update check with prompt
• Optimized font sizes for all devices
• Improved Chrome Cast quality
• Multi-screen improved (tested on TV & Phone)
• Bug fixes and streaming enhancements

More features will be available in future updates.
